00054   AhcConditions(int moduleNr, unsigned moduleID, int calibStart, int calibWidth, bool calibEnable,
00055                    int hold, int holdWidth, int multiplex, int vcalib, int verification, int sr[12]) {
00056     
00057     obj()->setIntVal(0, moduleID);
00058     obj()->setIntVal(1, moduleNr);
00059     obj()->setIntVal(2, calibStart);
00060     obj()->setIntVal(3, calibWidth);
00061     if (calibEnable)  obj()->setIntVal(4, 0);
00062     else  obj()->setIntVal(4, 1);
00063     obj()->setIntVal(5, hold);
00064     obj()->setIntVal(6, holdWidth);
00065     obj()->setIntVal(7, multiplex);
00066     obj()->setIntVal(8, vcalib);
00067     obj()->setIntVal(9, verification);
00068 
00069     obj()->setIntVal(10, sr[0]);
00070     obj()->setIntVal(11, sr[1]);
00071     obj()->setIntVal(12, sr[2]);
00072     obj()->setIntVal(13, sr[3]);
00073     obj()->setIntVal(14, sr[4]);
00074     obj()->setIntVal(15, sr[5]);
00075     obj()->setIntVal(16, sr[6]);
00076     obj()->setIntVal(17, sr[7]);
00077     obj()->setIntVal(18, sr[8]);
00078     obj()->setIntVal(19, sr[9]);
00079     obj()->setIntVal(20, sr[10]);
00080     obj()->setIntVal(21, sr[11]);
00081 
00082   };

00109     return (unsigned) (getIntVal(3));

00111   
00114   bool isCalibEnabled() const {
00115     return (getIntVal(4)==0);
00116   };
00117

00121     return (unsigned) getIntVal(5);

00123

00127     return (unsigned) getIntVal(6);

00133     return (unsigned) (getIntVal(7));
